Thanks for playing!

- New stories

Thanks for playing!

NEW LOCATION: LONDON!
Get ready to rub elbows with fashion royalty! Head on down to London and explore a whole new neighborhood with new stories, new activities, a chic new place to shop, and a beautiful mansion just for you!

NEW STORE: HOUSE OF FASHION
London has been the birthplace of a lot of fashion trends throughout history. Set your own trends and customise your look by shopping at House of Fashion, an exclusive store showcasing the best of British fashion!

A MANSION OF YOUR OWN
A Hollywood superstar deserves to always live in the lap of luxury. Your new home away from home is the London mansion, a lavish townhouse on three floors! Customise it with different furniture, change your hairstyle and make-up in your private beauty studio, and pick out stylish outfits from the wardrobe.

NEW STORIES!
Who's waiting for you in London? What sort of drama is happening in Hollywood this week? Play to find out!

Thanks for playing!

A MANSION OF YOUR OWN
A Hollywood superstar deserves to always live in the lap of luxury. Your new home away from home is the London mansion, a lavish townhouse on three floors! Customise it with different furniture, change your hairstyle and make-up in your private beauty studio, and pick out stylish outfits from the wardrobe.

NEW STORIES!
Who's waiting for you in London? What sort of drama is happening in Hollywood this week? Play to find out!

Thanks for playing!

NEW FEATURE: FASHION EVENTS!
Recruit other players, vote and participate in special events! Create beautiful outfits and win amazing prizes!

NEW BUILDING: HALL OF FASHION!
New, modern building reserved only for Fashion events in Hollywood!

NEW STORIES!
Bella will introduce you to a new feature which will shake the Hollywood upside down!

Thanks for playing!

A new update is available!
- new feature: Babies are coming to Hollywood Story!
- adopt your own baby, customise it’s appearance and play with it!
- baby clothes and accessories: make your baby as stylish as you are
- keep your baby happy and earn special gifts!
- new stories
- bugfixes
- game improvements and visual tweaks

Become a Star Club member!
- exclusive new store, reserved for true stars only
- premium dresses as weekly gifts
- daily diamonds for loyal club members
- up to 50% discount on premium clothes in every store
- maximum energy increased

- bugfixes

A new update is available!
To celebrate its 6th birthday, Hollywood Story just got a HUGE make-over! This update brings you an exciting visual revamp - get ready to explore your favorite characters’ new looks, and be sure to check your closet for an astonishing redesign of choice outfits!
In addition to this aesthetic overhaul, the update introduces:
- new clothes
- new events
- game improvements and visual tweaks
- bug fixes
Thanks for playing!

A new update is available!
To celebrate its 6th birthday, Hollywood Story just got a HUGE make-over! This update brings you an exciting visual revamp - get ready to explore your favorite characters’ new looks, and be sure to check your closet for an astonishing redesign of choice outfits!
In addition to this aesthetic overhaul, the update introduces:
- new clothes
- new events
- game improvements and visual tweaks
- bug fixes
Thanks for playing!

A new update is available!

’Tis the season! With a jolly new melody, this update will stir up your holiday cheer! Snow has fallen on the streets of Hollywood, making it a true winter wonderland, but the festive updates don’t end there - get cozy and enjoy a special holiday story!

New events coming up:

- Fan Gifts event: Christmas Party
- Gold Pass event: Winter Wish

Other additions include:

- new stories
- new clothes
- game improvements and visual tweaks
- bug fixes

Thanks for playing!

Love is in the air! To celebrate, this update brings you the Sweetheart Bundle – a special Valentine’s Day offer you won’t be able to resist! Affairs of the heart will be on display in new stories, and our unique events will have you head over heels!

New events:

- Fan Gifts: Heart’s Desire
- Gold Pass: Be My Valentine

Other additions include:

- new stories
- new looks
- game improvements and visual tweaks
- bug fixes
